name: Spear Spartan
description:
Spear Spartan is a fondian type game, heavily inspired by Jump King. 

Controls

AD - Movement

SpaceBar - Jump

M1 - Throw Spear

M2 - Return Spear

Functions 

-Stand on the tip of spear to jump higher. (Spear will be destroyed if you stand on it too long) 

-Only one side of the spear has this function.
